org.sakaiproject.util

Interface MultiSingleStorageSql

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MultiSingleStorageSqlDb2, MultiSingleStorageSqlDefault, MultiSingleStorageSqlHSql, MultiSingleStorageSqlMsSql, MultiSingleStorageSqlMySql, MultiSingleStorageSqlOracle

    public interface MultiSingleStorageSql
    database methods.

      • getXmlWhereLimitSql

        String getXmlWhereLimitSql(String selectBy,
                         String orderBy,
                         String tableName,
                         int first,
                         int maxCount)
        returns the SQL statement which retrieves a limited number of rows selected by a particular value for a specified field (the selectBy parameter) and returned in ascending order by another specified field (the orderBy parameter). The limit on the number of rows is specified by values for the first item to be retrieved (indexed from 0) and the maxCount.
        Parameters:
        selectBy - The name of a field to be used in a where clause with the value provided separately.
        orderBy - The name of a field to be used in an order-by clause
        tableName - The table on which the query is to operate
        first - A non-negative integer indicating the first record to return, indexed from 0.
        maxCount - A positive integer indicating the maximum number of records to return
